lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and welcome, everybody, to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and shout dirty things at me and play Dungeons & Dragons. Way too late on that draw. But yes, welcome! First and foremost, before we jump into tonight's game, we have some announcements to get through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Testicle roach! (dubious noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we get into the formal announcements, first off, those of us who were at the Stream of Many Eyes this past weekend had a great time. Hope you guys who tuned in to check out any of it have looked on YouTube to see the videos. We had some fun games with some great DMs-- I had the opportunity with the Force Grey game-- and we all got to play with a bunch of other great people in the community. And Deborah Ann Woll is an amazing DM. She's pretty badass. But yeah, anyway, hope you guys enjoyed it. But, bringing us into our first announcements tonight, we have our fantastic returning partner-in-crime for this campaign thus far: our sponsor, D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: D&D Beyond, everyone. Yeah, there's an animated thing that, if you haven't seen, you should check out, that's pretty cool. As announced during the Stream of Many Eyes this past weekend, new adventures, Waterdeep: Dragon Heist and Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, are now available-- on Laura's phone-- for preorder on D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fun note to that, actually, too: the Dragon Heist adventure, I was one of the story and creative consultants on for that book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Humble dragon-brag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit, every now and then. But I got to put a little bit of my flavor on there. So many great people put it together; I was just happy to be even a part of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great friends, guys. It's really-- just exemplifies the relationship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your name again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I thought I would inspire our audience by showing them what kind of-- some samples of some new monsters that they could create. Now, you could use the same old stats, but maybe you give them a little new spin or a new flair. And to help, I made some artistic interpretations of some of my new monsters. So these are some new monsters you can create. You guys have all heard of a bulette? We fought them? Well, this is a bull-ette. It's a female bullet! You can tell 'cause it's pink!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you print out a picture of a bullet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I printed out a picture of a bullet and I colored it in pink. And it only fires once, so it's a very quick encounter. You've heard of a displacer beast? This is a Despacito beast. It's the same thing as a displacer beast, except you hear "dub-a-dub-a Puerto Rico dub-a-dub-a ay, bandito" when it goes invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't actually go invisible, but continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is a problem, 'cause it blows the invisibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did your children draw these, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I drew these. You guys have heard of an owlbear. Well, what about putting a little creative spin on it and making it a bowel-bear? It has crippling IBS. Oh, there's more, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could also be like a fro-yo factory, I mean, that's not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it has a shit-spray attack. Here's one I'm pretty proud of. You guys, there's a monster in the Manual called the giant wasp. Well, this is the giant WASP. But he's a White Anglo-Saxon Person. A WASP! You know, a WASP-y guy! He's a WASP!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that what the 'P' stands for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not true? I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like you're reaching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, there's two more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, please stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, there's two more. This is a bone dirtdevil. It's a bone devil that cleans up after every fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you draw that one, or is it your kid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just a manticore with Fanta as a head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a lot of work going into this. You can tell. I mean, there are Xeroxed copies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You like the bone dirtdevil?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want a Fanta-core right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fanta-core, I'm down with.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What flavors does the Fanta-core come in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dangerous and well-branded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check out more on my website.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Save those for the next Sam Riegel bundle you can buy on D&D Beyond six months from now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure the only monster here is you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's free, and you get to support some of your favorite creators out there, so go check it out if you haven't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For a split-second, you sounded like Kermit the Frog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, that's a good one. Winner. That's a blue-ribbon echelon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (tearfully) I just thought of it five seconds ago and I'm so happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Traveling along the way, you managed to save and make friends with a very young kenku named Kiri who has been accompanying you through your journey thus far. You managed to find an individual who could guide you through the swamp, who was summarily taken and probably eaten by a troll that was stalking you through the swamp. You found an ally named Cali, Calianna, who was a dragon-blooded sorcerer who seemed to have aligned interests towards the direction you were traveling to find the safe house that belonged to the Gentleman that had gone quiet. Upon hearing that there had been some sort of attack on it, all of you went through the swamp, forded the dangers, made your way to the base of the tree, where it was discovered to be within and below the base of this large banyan tree on the northern side of the Labenda Swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it called a bangin' tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to rest up, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm a little tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But there's fish men and possibly fish women right down there that could come out and kill us in our sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think Caleb has a little booby trap for that, don't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb starts silver threading the entrance that Fjord swam through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we sleep upstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Upstairs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pull the rope up, that way we'll have plenty of time if we hear them coming back up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Add some distance, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if there's unlimited numbers of them? What if there's a whole--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I only saw, like, five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You only saw like five. Did you keep going down into the tunnels?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but I got pretty fucking sharp eyes, all right? They call me Eagle-Eye Fjord where I come from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did they really?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cawing) Crow Fjord, or maybe raven, you don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of nicknames.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the warning system, we'll have plenty of time to get away if there's too many of them and they'll have no way up if we pull the rope up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what will we put in the doorway of the tree, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if we leave the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, are we sleeping in the tree?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People will keep watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That way we'll have an early warning before they even manage to crawl their way up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we know where the entrance is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The moment that they exit the pool, we'll know and it would wake me up, or you up, or anybody up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to gloss over the fact that Fjord has three bird nicknames?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bird-Eye Fjord I think is what he was getting at, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also very popular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri pipes up. (like Jester) "Bird-Eye Fjord."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, Kiri, Bird-Eye Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Bird-Eye Fjord."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's sticking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Fjord) "Sticking."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does not sound good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we call you B.E.F. for short? Bird-Eye Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. We make our way up the rope into the bottom of the tree, but the entrance is still open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are making your way up and climbing using the roots and the rope and the interior, you begin to, now that you're not focused on what's below, notice that a lot of the earth in this particular tunnel-- that isn't too wide necessarily, it's about three feet wide in most places-- You can see the claw marks where it's been dug out. The softer portion of the ground where you landed upon emerging from making your way down, you can see a lot of the earth and chunks of root that have been carved out. It wasn't a natural tunnel or something they discovered; they dug up into the safe house to retrieve whatever was inside. Nevertheless, you all make your way up into the hollow base of the safe house tree. You guys can set up camp if you'd like to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take first watch, if you want. I can post up outside and do a little illusion work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll join you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to teach you some sayings. How long can you keep mimicking things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Mimicking things."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take that as a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Long time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. I'm going to tell you if someone asks what your name is, you say, "I am Kiri."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "I am Kiri."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, look at this, this is great! Okay, and then if they go, "Are you nice?" You say, "Yes, "I'm very sweet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Yes, I'm very sweet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If they say something you don't like, you say, "Go fuck yourself."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Go fuck yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, I can't believe you said it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like a sound board.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You say, "Fuck yourself."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Go fuck yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's good. Okay, that's a good start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, if you get really excited, you should go (air horn blaring).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (air horn blaring)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, don't do that, Kiri! Don't!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin's hair gets poofed out and his tail floofs out and he starts growling at the sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About what time is it, anyway? Light still coming in from the outside of the tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little bit of blue cresting into night time. Light's coming through the trees, but it looks like you're about half an hour out from a pitch black sky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it my turn with the dodecahedron?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes! Do you want it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For today?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait for the morning, unless you want to use it today, and then somebody else will get it in the morning. Because it only lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you use it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not. Oh, I did. We have to save it for tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I more want to examine it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes, here. Do you want to take it out of the bag?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Can I borrow the bag?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to spend maybe a half-hour before bed not trying to use it, but just examine it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Assessing its design, paying attention to its construct and the handles, and the edging of where the different facets of it are affixed to this cage-like exterior to it, you really have no idea what material it's made from. The faint magical essence that comes off of it, and with the training you have had across the various schools of magic, this seems hard to pin down. You're not sure the source of its magic, but it does seem very old. It seems like it's been shaped or it's been polished from whatever its raw form was at one point in time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, this evening I'm going to use it for the grand purpose of being my pillow in the bag, so I'm going to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I'm putting it back on my body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does my head do this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you were sleeping on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, using it as a pillow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me ask you something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shoot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I messed up. I think maybe I should apologize to Caleb. I'm not very good at apologizing, though. I was wondering if maybe you could give me some pointers for apologizing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not good at apologizing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're being facetious, aren't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm fucking with you. You reckon you need to apologize?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I probably got a little too aggressive, probably shouldn't have grabbed him like that. Got a little too angry. That's not necessarily my good side, you know, don't like people seeing that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, a great place to start with apologies is to mention the stuff you just said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That I'm not good at apologies?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, after that, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a little too aggressive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I have a bad side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I shouldn't have done it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's a really good apology.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that pretty good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. However, right? Be genuine. Don't be embarrassed to apologize. It takes a big person to apologize for something. Little people are the ones that make mistakes and just let them go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, like Nott? A little person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, like small on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, like in your soul.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's big of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's, you know, I want to try, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think he deserves that. He's been good to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully it goes well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it will. You can actually leave the smile out of it this time, just to be clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Not like: I'm sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's going to set the tone in a real weird way. There's a thing called sarcasm that you ride a line with sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the rest of you find yourselves to sleep, or is there anything else you wish to do before the night's done? Any order of taking watch, or are you all just resting under the protection of Caleb's silver thread?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Beau and I are up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Second as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are having that conversation, one of you roll with advantage on your perception check, or you can both roll separately, your call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's roll separately. Oof, terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, leave him hanging.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her perception is low, you wouldn't see the high five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five? Oh five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are finishing your conversation, your watch comes to an end without incident.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With an arrow in our throat? I didn't see-- (choking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rest so easily with the blood leaking out. You finish your watch, you wake up Nott and Jester, and you guys take on your second watch. Do you want to both make a roll for perception or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's roll separately!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Worked out great last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. I think it's 12 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: High roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are taking some time, concentrating on listening out for anything and feeling pretty solid in your ability to maintain vigil across this dark, eerie night in the center of this hollow tree, you don't hear or see a goddamned thing. But a little twinkle hits your ears, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As suddenly something down below, by the pool on the opposite end of that kidney-shaped interior cavern, seems to go off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you come to consciousness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are awake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, fish, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're on watch. We haven't seen anything, it's just a dream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, down below, in my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the cavern? In the tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? Should we wake everyone up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should wake everyone up!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wake up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wake up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord! (cawing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't wake up Kiri, though. She deserves a really nice night's sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She really does, let her sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's all curled up in the corner, like (trilling) with her feathers all poofed up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to give her my blanket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to send Frumpkin to crawl down and get a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a stealth check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Frumpkin fall down the tunnel, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cats can do some pretty crazy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine. Good, four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin drops down onto the soft and makes it around. Focusing on it, you can see that another merrow has emerged into that chamber and-- nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't hide the bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes around and sees the bodies there lying in the middle of the space. He (growls).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, we left the corpses out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes and drags him back a little bit, begins rifling through whatever it might have had, and looks over right at Frumpkin. Grabs the trident spear and throws it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you snap him out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't close enough to do that, I don't think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No? 100 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 100 feet to snap him back, or is it shorter than that? Double-check on that real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, again, again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kitten kebab.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I remember saying that we should hide the corpses and Cali actually said, "Don't do it, "there's no point to it." So we should blame Cali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember Cali saying that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what Cali said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually have no memory of anything on range for bamfing in and out, but I will defer to you because you're my DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As an action, you can temporarily dismiss your familiar." It doesn't say range. "You can "cause it to reappear within 30 feet of you." That's what I forgot. So you can do that. The last thing you see, briefly, before Frumpkin vanishes, is this three-pronged trident rocking through the darkness, with what faint little bit of visibility that Frumpkin has, not even being able to see much down there in the darkness before disappearing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, there is one down there right now and he tried to kill my cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go down there or should we stay up here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hit the wall against the hole, right? We'll take either side of it, either flank.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we just blow up the hole?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, because we still want to go down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do we want to go down there? There's crazy people down there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, shut up! Because there's treasure and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could just say, "Be quiet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, please be quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly, I want you to get right on the edge of the hole and keep an eye down the shaft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) (like Jester) "Go fuck yourself."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I love her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We woke her up, though, but it was cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, (shushing).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to prepare Magic Missile like a held spell for a fish head popping out of the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can wait for something and then cast the spell as an action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I'd lose the slot if I held the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you ended up holding it for a few minutes, yes, because the idea is that you're casting the spell and then holding onto that last piece of the incantation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I won't do that, then, but I will watch the hole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is our rope still dangling down the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you pulled the rope up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold Sacred Flame because it's a cantrip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to activate one sword, hold it behind my back, sit at the edge, and wait to give a swing. See if anything is going to pop up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it come all the way up if it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it comes up, should we grab it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grapple it, fall flat, kill it quietly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take a moment in silence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be going back and telling its friends, though, and they're all going to come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think those guys have strong family bonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two minutes pass. Three minutes pass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. What if it digs up a hole in another area, you guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys take a surprise round. As soon as it emerges to go ahead and inspect, it's like, "Huh?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It came up the tunnel that was already there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It emerged and jack-in-the-boxed out towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dex save of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a four, nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten radiant damage. Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fired and missed with a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, buddy. (whoosh) Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a standard attack, or standard and bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purpose of it all happening at once, just one attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two strikes or one strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two strikes. It's whatever your attack action is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's awful. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both miss. Unfortunately, because you guys don't have any light in here, when it emerges, you're all swinging in the darkness hoping to hit it in the direction of where it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no lights up, so I should be at disadvantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to roll again. What does that say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this Magic Missile?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I had to Fire Bolt so it wouldn't matter how long I held it. My lower is a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 20 total. That's 11 damage. My second attack missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did Eldritch Blast and a 20 and a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten and a nine. 19 points of Eldritch Blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a ten, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On your first attack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Second attack. There we go. That's a 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone hit something. Yay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should really separate out your dice, Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know it's making you crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Monstrous or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are considered monstrosities, so consider that for any damage you deal to them with your sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging, so you don't have the plus two. Nor do you have your--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Path of Divine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, because you're not raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough. Even with all of your misses, you watch as it emerges, and then (multiple impacts) and slumps. Yeah, as you grab it, it starts sliding back into the tunnel. You grab and lift him-- he's heavy as shit-- and you all together manage to slip it into and onto the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just watched all that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying on guard in case anything else comes through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What little bit of light you have in the chamber right now is a little faint, radiant glow from the sword that Molly currently has that is like candlelight, if anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull out a rag and do my veiled lantern thing with Dancing Lights.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably put another one of those things up, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put one of what things up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another alarm!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Down there? You want me to go down there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want me to go with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you and Yasha go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to send Frumpkin down again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin emerges, you send Frumpkin back down. Make a stealth check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Frumpy. Nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The loudest cat you've ever heard. Frumpkin is the neighborhood cat in heat at this point. He makes his way down through the tunnel. Make a perception check with disadvantage for Frumpkin because he's now coming around the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would it cancel out, is why I'm asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would it cancel out? I would ask you to keep the stats of your cat on you for future reference.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have advantage on wisdom perception checks that rely on smell. I'd say sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So cancel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it'll cancel out, so a straight roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's a fish. Cats are really perceptive when it comes to fish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty good. Perception, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin heads on down, keeps an eye out on that space, does a little pass. No sign of any other emerging or present merrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Instead of putting another wire down there, you could leave Frumpkin down there, and he can alert us if there's any problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he's got to stay awake for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could watch, but the alarm is just as good. It's automatic, gets me up, Frumpkin can sleep. After you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going down there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By yourselves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take good care of him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we hear anything, we're going to charge down there. They'll be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't make it without you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He will not come back alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I will take care of him as best as I can. Even better than that, I will take care of him. I promise you, he will not die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He will have no chance of survival. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slowly lowering the rope back down the tunnel, which one of you is taking point on climbing down?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way down, the rope aiding you in the process. You get to the bottom, you as well. I'd like you both to roll stealth checks, please, as you emerge in the lower cavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You two gingerly step your way around the edge, back to the site you can see of the three corpses of the merrow there in the center of the opposite side of the cavern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have my hand on Yasha's enormous, rippling shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way around to the other pool, you can see the water, disturbed relatively recently, isn't perfectly still, but it's nearing there. It's coming to rest. No sign of anything down there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, do your shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need about ten minutes. In the dark, I pull out the thread and I start doing the thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Make it a little faster than ten if you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't do that, but I will do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five minutes go by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Message. Are you still alive? You can reply to this message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mention that they should clean up the bodies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. While Yasha's waiting, she can clean up the bodies. You can reply to this message.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will start to move the bodies.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll say that I said that out loud to her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. What did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott had a wonderful idea for you to pick up all of the dead things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you begin to drag the bodies back into the central pool. They sink.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Flow in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You finish the spell, you sense the arcane, unseen net of the alarm click in, and it's prepared and set to keep watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get the shit out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Run away!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back, climb back up the rope, and make your way into the interior of the tree, seemingly without incident.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seemingly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going back to sleep, you guys. I need to get my spells back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take the next watch since I'm awake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha takes final watch. Go ahead and roll a perception check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm freaked out, so I'm going to stay up with Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make perception checks for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception, 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Run away, run away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys complete the third watch for the evening, you sense the morning come as the temperature, which previously had gotten quite chilled, is beginning to rise a bit, though now you can still see your breath in the air. A faint bit of bluish light begins to appear at the outer edges of the driftwood piece that is wedged in the doorway to make it look flush with the rest of the exterior bark. You all complete a long rest. You have your abilities back, your hit points full, and you are ready to continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could I back up one hour and ask Yasha a quick question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a small group for you, you traveled with the circus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a big group for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any advice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You seem awkward like me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you made it work with a lot of people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, if someone has a conversation with me, I will talk to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've tried that too, and it goes horribly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I don't think it goes as bad as you think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it goes pretty bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But that doesn't mean-- there's always room for improvement--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm confused, did you have advice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I'm good at giving advice, but just talk to people if they talk to you, and be nice, you know. Eat with your mouth closed, wash your hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start writing these things down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wash your hair when you can, that's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It just rained though. This is the cleanest I've been in weeks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (dubious noise) I feel like you're still-- how do you stay dirty all the time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Most of the time I'm trying to. People don't pay attention to beggars so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you don't want people to pay attention to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, in general.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get that. I feel that way, but I'm hard to miss. I don't mean that in a, "Woo, I'm hard to miss."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're as big as a giant barn, you are hard to miss.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what I miss?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaving.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could shave you right now with my sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Yes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've done it before, I like to not have hair on my arms. This is what I do. I really think that cleanliness and hygiene is very important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One thing that I have realized today is that I need to work on my interpersonal skills and friendship making. So try not to cut up my face, okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, do you just want a trim? Is there a certain look you want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, leave my hair on my head, but I have not had a clean-shaven face in a long time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want it all gone, or you just want--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you can take it all.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's easier to do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can crush a person, but I'm not quite sure how dexterous you are, so I don't want any fancy tricks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I won't. I'm going to hold it like this, and then the blade-- this is how I do it. I hold it, and then I whoosh, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your five-foot greatsword? (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So sit here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I lie on the ground?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, lie down. I've never done it like that, but yeah, lie down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you done this before?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have done this before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not with this, something a little smaller.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lie on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In the early dawn hours of the new day, as the blue begins to slowly become brighter in the distance--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait! This means we are friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (inhales)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't have to hold your breath because it will take a very long time and you'll pass out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That might be better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You need to relax, breathe in, breathe out. Okay, I got it. Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like you to roll a dexterity check, please. Take advantage because he's not moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four globules of light rise up around you as you begin to shave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you come to consciousness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you killing Caleb?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I was giving him a shave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Whoa!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's much better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a little thing! You have a little dimple on your chin! That's the cutest! I didn't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So boyish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you almost look innocent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's inner monologue is: I want to shrivel up and die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice work, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, if anyone else-- none of you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or Jester might want a bikini.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe soon, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, I've done it before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This I can confirm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we gear up and head down and kill a bunch of fish people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a brief moment with the dodecahedron before handing the bag back to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you don't forget.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll forget.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take the rope, we start lowering it down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going down there? Again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're killing everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the way down, I smack Caleb a bit on the back and say: Well done, she likes you! And head down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Pass without a Trace on us and be stealthier?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think right before we go under the water we should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Under the water?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, this is an amphibious assault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many v's are in that word?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Amvivious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amphibious. Yeah, there's a sea "anenome" under there as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't do well with water. I don't think I can go down there. Why don't I stay watch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why aren't you good in water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can hold your breath, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I hold onto you and push you along?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to be all right with Caleb going without you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember our swimming lesson?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like it, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, when we get down there, I'm going to swim a rope under the water to where we're going. It's going to be like a guide line, so whoever you ride with can pull on the rope and you'll just hang on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a bad idea for you to stay. We would need you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls the knife out. (like Fjord) "It's an amphibious assault."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you, Kiri.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taking the piss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where should we leave Kiri for this? We can't bring her over with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay with Kiri. You guys can go, and I can stay with Kiri.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't like that idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need you, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not good at many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah you are! You can shoot things. And you can sneak around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not very good at finding traps, but everything else you're quite good at.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then what are we going to do with Kiri?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She can't go with us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she can't. We could leave her in here with you if you want, but if you see trouble you're going to have to get in that water and come across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. One or the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Yes, I'm very sweet."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay with Kiri, and if there's trouble, we'll see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, you stay here with Nott, then, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be one down, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'll take the other 50-foot section of rope and I'll start wading into the water, and I'll take a swim back the way I went.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait! Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the sound of Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Aqua Velva.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Ed Wynn getting tickled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace. What's the range on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 feet. So it's not going to to be for a very long time. But--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well it's only 30 feet in front of-- around me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you may want to go next.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll go away-- huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may want to go next then if you want that to affect other people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about me. I'm just swimming over there and coming back. And then we can cast it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a guideline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Making your way through, make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay. You manage to find it through, and then come up quietly, just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apocalypse Now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Apocalypse Now and/or The Descent. You slowly emerge from the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, The Descent. Now it makes me want to swim through that little tunnel even less!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So Descent-y, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing up, your range of darkvision is 30 feet or 60 feet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is that? Class features--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Racial features, it should say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Racial traits. Darkvision. 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet, great. That gives you enough perspective for now as you come up and look. You can see this chamber, and you got a brief glance at it before. Most of it is natural rock, but there are elements of it that look like it was once an old bit of mason architecture. You can see edges where there are actual stones stacked and placed. Walls that have seemingly been partially reclaimed through the ages. You can see two large central pillars where stalagmite and stalactite met eventually and created a structure in the center. A large portion of the floor is submerged in water, and you see different paths and avenues of it that curve off and vanish. Probably openings to other tunnels beneath. The pool you're in right there, looking up you can see there's that weird set of natural stairs that step up in front. You can see four of these merrow creatures, two of which are in a conversation off to the left, two that are currently rummaging through what looks to be piles of things that have been pulled up and placed toward the top of the stair. You can hear the clinking of metal and things falling and tumbling down the stairs. You see a fifth figure that's at the outskirts of your visual range that's currently faced away and looking at whatever's on the other side of that upward pillar. But nobody else seems to have noticed you emerging at this point. You haven't made any shifting or movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they have an eyeline on me if they were to look over this way? Could they see my head above the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible if they were looking carefully for you. You don't know how far their darkvision extends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I wade forward and look for any stones or pillars that I might be able to throw the rope around and tie a knot on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you can see there are small mounds of various minerals that have long dripped from the ceiling from condensation and various water flows that have come through this interior cavern and built this hard, rocky platform that's emerging just outside of where the pool ends. So you can bring the rope around and affix it to that. Make a stealth check as you do so, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no. He didn't take it. More than 30 feet away from me, right? He's more than 30 feet away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should have given him Blessing of the Trickster. Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep! That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural one. You lucky son of a bitch! Through whatever grace your patron has granted upon you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the water, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The merrow are too distracted with whatever they are in the process of doing to notice you slip and hit an elbow, send a pebble falling. You get low and finish tying it off. They don't notice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, great. I'll give it a gentle tug. Does it seem like the structure moves at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It seems pretty solid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take a deep breath and I'll use it to pull myself chest up towards the surface.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough. So after a few moments, Fjord emerges back where you guys are waiting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you made it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody should be able to pull their way across no problem. But we got to be ready to rock when we get in there. They're a little distracted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to try and wait in the water and ambush as we go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or distract away from us and then go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or if we want we could cause a commotion and have them come through the water at us and use the hole as a funnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a funnel? Might not be a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thoughts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That might be smarter, and then you could fight with us, Nott, for a while at least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't like fighting, but sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so good at it, Nott!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Someone's going to have to go make a distraction and then make it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I bet those things are pretty good swimmers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Super fast in the water. I bet they're really fast in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could tie the rope-- oh, we can't tie the rope to you, because now it's tied on the other side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a very fast swimmer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But faster than fish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ignore what I said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your regular swimming speed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your swim speed is half your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well then yeah, it's 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well with it, it's my normal walking speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right, with that it is, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're a fast swimmer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, that's pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But probably not as fast as they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, could I guesstimate how far it was from entrance to portal? Where the rope is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are to the-- make a survival check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Best you could estimate, it's close to 40 or so feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has he been gone for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're in here talking about what was there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we just made a lot of noise in here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm of the opinion that the problem with this bottleneck is we don't know what they are doing on the other side. It would be easier to assess what's coming and make sure that they can't-- if we take care of everything there, then we can assess what's there and they can't prepare or get more together. Have time to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you want to head over there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like over there is the way to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I see the validity in that argument.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll get in the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll stay together in a group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long did you have to hold your breath for, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. About 45, 50 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Easy peasy lemon squeezy. Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your first dive down took a while to feel your way through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was distracted. I was thinking about my books. I don't want them to get harmed. Your bag is probably water resistant, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, but we can try it. Give me your books, Caleb. Give me the books.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to leave them with Nott?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do want to leave them with Nott. I'm going to unharness the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you still cast spells?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll leave my coat here. I'm not dragging that into the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you come after us, would you please hide them under a stone or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many books you got there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a very nice sling thing. It'd be a shame if anything happened to it. Are you sure you're not coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My duty is to take care of Kiri. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we, Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did it already!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit balls ass! Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lasts for an hour, though, so it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri leans into you. "This means we are friends."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She heard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She woke up early.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds like Caleb. Wow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, that was-- okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's going to rattle off some secrets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kiri's got to die. Thousands of artists are like (gasping).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's first? Are you going back through first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll go second. People should follow quickly behind me because you've got to stay within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One quick attack, or do we try and take them out quietly? I assume-- well, we'll take a look at what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Distract and attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're doing the distract? But then they know somebody's there! If we just come out of the water and attack, we get a sneak attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they don't see us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they don't see us, then we get the sneak attack. And if they do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go for it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see what we see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As I go in the water, I'm going to go about halfway and then stop and tread and make sure that everybody gets along the rope fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. You're casting Pass Without a Trace first? All right. You finish casting the spell. The shadows, already super dark in here with almost no light source beyond what Caleb's providing, they coalesce around you and the rest of the members of the team as you all dive into the pool of water. It's black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, Blessing of the Trickster on the way through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need everybody, including Fjord, to roll a stealth check, please. Plus ten to your stealth score.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They rolled really high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god for that Pass Without a Trace. 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, girl! Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's some Vax numbers right there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zweiundzwanzig. 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, 16. Oh, no! 18!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's good, Ashley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am one with the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all quickly emerge from the water below, your eyes focusing. There is no light source in this chamber. So for those of you-- you have your darkvision on. You guys all have darkvision, I am pretty sure, except for you, Caleb. So you're relying on the rest of them to give any sort of presence--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listening to their footfalls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So pretty!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow! Where are we?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow wowie wow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is happening? Why is there a remote control?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's putting water effects on it! Shut up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, it just got blue!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would need you guys to place yourselves amongst this pool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There it goes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the smoke!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, we got smoke!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've never had smoke before!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think I'd enjoy this quite so soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri and Nott exist on the outskirts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys glance up, the first thing you see is there is one merrow right there who's currently talking and discussing with one right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is wrong. This is right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Place yourselves where you want to be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's still wrong, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one at the base of this, right there. Up at the top, facing away, is the one that you had seen at the top of the stairs, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the one that was distracted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all emerge headfirst from the water, everybody gets a surprise round except for Yasha and Molly, unfortunately. You two did not roll high enough to beat the stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They rolled really high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They rolled pretty high. Everyone roll initiative, but you guys will be out of this round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Colville. You fucked me, Colville.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to try and do a clockwise attack? Knock them out as we go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we try to do a distraction?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yo, what's up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Might be a first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. 20 to 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck. Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Oh my god, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Single digits and 21.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sechs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, hold on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Molly, Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, Molly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about you, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a big fat three.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my lord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're not engaging? Just for the sake of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a plus four to initiative, so I guess that's five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's still better than Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My natural one beats yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all emerge from it. Yasha, you would be first, but your stealth, you did not surprise the individuals from this round point. He doesn't notice you guys, that's a seven. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, okay. Beau's up first. Are we just going to go for these guys? We're not going to do some sort of distraction?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is the surprise round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that you're getting a better view of this, you can see a low mist is pouring down the stairs and is filling the space around them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is all water, I'm assuming, in the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of this is water, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good. It's acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move? I'm going to go for this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Easy enough. You get right to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a way I can jump across and try and fight him from over here? Do I have enough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll splash in the water. You won't make it all the way to the opposite side, or you may, but he'll get an attack of opportunity on you as you dart out of his melee range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, no. I'm going to try and do some KGB-level shit. I'm going to do a quick kidney punch and try and go for the temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Krav Maga!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And influence the election.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, if you wanted to jump across, I will say because he's surprised, and he isn't aware that you're there quite yet, if you want to leap across, make an acrobatics check, if you still wanted to try and do so. You will land in the water. You'll be about waist-high in the water, if not more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'll be good. This is regular attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First attack. That was good. 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. That's garbage, that's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight damage. I'm going to spend a ki and do Flurry of Blows. Two unarmed strikes. Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, that thing does not make up its mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it does not. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Roll damage for that fourth attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four damage. Wait, I rolled the wrong one. That's much better. Ten damage. I'm going to spend another ki point and do Stunning Strike. Jab to the ribs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's doing damage to it. As you slam into it again, turns around. It looks like it's surprised and reeling from the impact of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were supposed to go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some spittle flies out of its growling mouth. That finishes your turn, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It'll be awesome when that Stunning Strike works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon right next to that one that Beau's fighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here, or this side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, in between the two of them. Yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Floating in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh snap, all right. Go make your attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's extra big, that's right. It's got more sparkle to it. It's got more sparkly bits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Marshmallow in the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to attack the one that Beau is attacking

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was on 20--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then it was like: nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is not going to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, swings wide. However, it has apparated and is useful in future rounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He already took some damage, so I'm going to Toll the Dead on him for my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gets hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tolled.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: He got Tolled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus H. Macy. Seven points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of necrotic damage to him, got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too bad. That finish your turn, Jester? You're going to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I'm going to get out of the water, and I'm going to go stand next to that thing that's coming out of the ground. Yeah, that thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The booby-looking thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the booby. The big pile of poo-looking thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quick question: From the fish guy up at the top there, if that was the corner of a cube, would it reach the one down by the lollipop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How big is the cube?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40-foot cube, excuse me, sorry. That's probably not big enough. That's too big, right? It's too far?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 40 feet's huge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, you mean from you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I were to hit the fish guy at the top and make that the corner of a cube and go this way, it would probably only get two of them, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forget it. I'm going to cast Haste on Mollymauk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I have had enough movement to get behind the big poo pile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't see. It's dark, I'm blind. It's the safer bet, to aid my friend on the next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For you, Molly. That's to signify your Haste. Keep that in mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have just been Hasted, and I am going to move along the wall this way away from the enemies that I think I can detect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the water, thrashing, trying to make your way to the edge. Molly, you're up, but you lose this round, because you were not part of the surprise. You were lagging a little behind, as Yasha-- best way I can do this quickly, because they're losing their turn as well. That brings us to-- Nott isn't even paying attention. Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I'll make my way towards the two on the left side, as far as my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the edge there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Oh damn, that's as far as I can get, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can go into the water if you want to go further. You want to get up to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, melee range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get melee range. You're in the water, and you're swimming in the water, but because of your armor, it doesn't reduce your attacks, so you're not taking disadvantage on your attack rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. I will use Booming Blade in a melee strike with the Wastehunter falchion against that fishy fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, take your one attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does? Oh my god, thank you. 1d8, because I didn't say two-handed. That's 12 points of damage, plus because it's a monstrosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 points of damage plus four. That is a four. 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage on that guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With Booming Blade--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he moves at all, on his next turn, he takes an additional 2d8. Good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes sir. With my bonus action, I will Hex this guy over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's been Hexed. Does that finish your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull back, the energy sparks around, and there's this weird movement in the water like it's thrashing, the booming energy keeping that one merrow locked in place, as the other one, the Hex coalesces around its chest and holds it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll give him disadvantage on wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom checks, got it. That ends top of the round. Now Yasha, you can take your turn. The ambush round is over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to mosey on up over next to Beau, and I would like to rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: (air horn blaring)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From the cavern behind us: (muffled air horn noises)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pull out my blade and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take the stubble off of it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Take an attack. Give it a nice shave. That is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Yasha! Come on, Yasha, plan ahead!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen, I know, I'm sorry. Where's the ones that I really like? There it is. (counting) 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do? You have a second attack, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have a second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not going to hit. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight misses, unfortunately. Next one swings, and a miss. Now the merrow all go together, because you guys left a big old gap of initiative there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's after Yasha, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. First part, I'm going to say-- Let's make it fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, let's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here is going to take his trident and chuck it right towards Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are these free tridents, or do they also have that cord that's attached to them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the harpoons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have the cords still attached. That's a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. With that to there, first off, Beau. As it strikes you in the chest, you take ten points of piercing damage, and I need you to make a strength check for me, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So good at this. Just a straight check, or a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19-- sorry, ten. It looked like a 19 upside down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a 14. You get pulled through right next to it there, in the middle of the water. As you fall to the ground, it's going to attempt to bite at you. Since you're in the water, outside of your terrain, I will give it advantage on the strike, because you're now thrashing water and swimming, and it's in its own terrain. That'll be 18 to hit. With the bite on you there, you take an additional eight points of piercing damage. At that moment, this one here is going to turn around onto Fjord, and is going to shift this way and unleash both bite and claw attack against you, Fjord. 17 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits; it's my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of piercing damage against you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you guys scan the area for Despacito beasts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to pull back after it finishes clawing into you. It's going to try and bite down with its jaws. That's a 19 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's another 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you take ten points of piercing damage. I need you to make a strength check. As it pierces, you grab it, and it manages to careen into the side of your hip, and it hits bone. You feel it grind against the inside with the pain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he's going to move forward to get his follow-up attack anyway with the rest of his movement, and is going to attempt to bite you, and is going to miss. That's a nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that is right next to you, Yasha, is going to shift around, not leaving combat with you, but going behind the pillar to give itself some cover from anybody who's out in the vicinity. It's going to attempt to make two strikes against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't-- I need to make Hex checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, how many of them? Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At advantage because War Caster, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll higher than a ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that, constitution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's a 15. Did 15 work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All three save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that's good on your end. For you, Yasha, you didn't use Reckless last turn, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that misses you with an eight. However, that finishes their round and this guy up here who now spins around and sees the rest of you come inside begins shouting out in a language you don't understand (snarling). As it's holding up this staff that has this almost crystal spike of natural crystal at the end of it, it begins to chant something under its breath. And as it spins its hand in the air, you watch as the ceiling above you in this chamber begins to grow into this low cloud that spirals out, encompassing the entirety of the interior of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see little sparks of lightning arcing through the cloud as it spools above.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucking druid fish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, since you're the one closest to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 16 points of lightning damage as you get struck by lightning in the water. Which you watch as technically now, yeah, if any of you are in the water when the lightning hits you, you have disadvantage on your saving throw because you are in the water. Didn't matter this time because you failed anyway, but you watch as the bolt strikes Beau and she starts thrashing in the water as the muscles tense. There's a giant burn mark on the side of your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, you guys! Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
