lines.text: Looking pretty rough on that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just got fucked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Getting itself between the rest of its merrow compatriots and you guys. That finishes their turn; Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! Okay, I'm going to take the one who's got a trident jabbed into my shoulder. I'm going to grab the chain and I'm going to yank it towards me as I deck him in the face twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The first attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to move around to get onto land, otherwise you're going to be having a hard time in the water here attacking them because you're constantly swimming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have movement, yeah. So you can move five, ten, 15, 20, 25 there. So you manage to whip around, get out, up onto land and not end up with a disadvantage on your attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, the first one is 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does hit, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woohoo! Okay, second attack; not as good, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately. But the first strike, as you pull up, cracks it right in the jaw. The next one, it manages to bash your arm out of the way and it deflects off the side-- no impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, that's seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, the first strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I am going to take my bonus and spend a ki point to do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you get up on land, you focus and looking around side-to-side, make sure that you're aware of everything around you and get ready to defend and deflect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little in shock. (pants) Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes Beau's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use Spiritual Weapon that I have up and try to hit that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll the attack for that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that hits, that's a good one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right, what was the number?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 plus my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 is its armor class, so yeah, that's fine. Well, 13 actually, so that definitely hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then 2d8-- seven points of force damage to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, plus four, so 11!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, that feels good. I haven't got that in a long time! I'm going to use the giant lollipop and it's going to raise really high up on the roof and then slam down onto it as hard as it can!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, as you're engaged with it, both growling at each other, you watch as suddenly its body crumples into the stonework.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I scream out, yeah, Jester!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slips into the water and vanishes beneath the waves.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I flip it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your bonus action. You still have your movement and action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm also going to move it closer to the one next to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to cast Cure Wounds at-- Should I do that? Or should I do Toll the Dead on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds is touch, so you have to be right next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding! I'm going to Toll the Dead on the one that Beau's fighting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the range on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: That's a lot of spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up next so be ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the lighting like in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? None, there is no light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet? All right, yeah, so you can do it from there if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. It's a wisdom save and he's Hexed on wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's disadvantage on wisdom checks, not wisdom saving throws. Hex doesn't affect saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am sorry. I did not understand that part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but, for instance, if you had said strength checks, then every time it tries to pull somebody, it would have disadvantage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that would have been better, then, huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The lesson in the lesson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But now you know, going forward with Hex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we survive this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, fuck me sideways.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel your pain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, that's pretty much all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cannot see anything. I'm going to move towards the sound of Jester shouting in the dark and I'm going to raise up the Glove of Blasting and try to shoot the fish-man that I heard way up high ahead of me, up the hill. They'll all be at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that's attacking Beau, or the one at the very top?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one with the staff at the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Disadvantage on all the attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We get like, little strobes from the lightning. It's like that opening sequence in Blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just barely hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then that is also 14, so just one of them hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is six points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does make a concentration check. Natural 17 plus two. It does succeed in maintaining concentration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. Caleb's done. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Hasty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run, I'm going to use my bonus action to activate one of my swords.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one? Or do you still have the one activated from before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, that would have still been activated, so shit, that's right. Yeah, I'm going to use my bonus action to activate the other one, too. I'm going to see if I can make it to that little hill over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one? Here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attack the one that's right in front of Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that will put you right there. So you rush up to the edge there. You used your bonus action, you have your two attacks and your hasted attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, so I'm going to do two attacks plus a hasted attack. That's 17. That hits, one does not, and then my third attack is a 16 that also hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two attacks. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage, nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You're using the d6's for your--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am using the d6's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its fins curl up from the side and you can smell this awful, swampy, almost sulfurous smell from its breath in your face. Is that your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Two attacks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was three attacks, one missed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Nott, who is waiting patiently with Kiri.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll send a Message to Caleb. Are you guys alive and do you need anything? You can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't move at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to think about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After getting so fucked up that last round-- the scratch, the bite, and the trident in the gut-- I'll put both hands on the falchion and say, Do not see me, and I'll cast Blink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Blink is not concentration, correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, all right. So with that, Fjord vanishes from the battlefield. We'll use this as a spatial positioning device of where you were before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. That brings it to the top of the round. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one across the way that's currently barrelling on Beau and there's the one at the top of the stairs right now that looks like it's commanding a giant storm.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go over to the one by Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 35. You're in the water swimming, so your attacks are at disadvantage right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to do Reckless, you could counteract that, but you'll be taking--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I had one natural 20, and then 18 was my lowest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so that was disadvantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She rolled a natural 20 for her other roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you, so the first attack was what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. So your first attack hits. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, same as last time. 19 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of damage, nice! All right, and you have your second attack, with disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits. Go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Murder it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is-- you only do five additional damage on this one. Right? So 15?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's bleeding out of its wounds in the middle of its stomach and its back. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I have a-- no, never mind, that's not a bonus action. Never mind, sorry. Was going to try Healing Hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It's their turn. So, I will need you, first off, to make a dexterity saving throw. As you come up and carve into the back of it, the one on top hisses and directs its finger down towards you as a bolt of lightning arcs out of the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, no, it's a saving throw, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, saving throw. Plus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's a dex saving throw? Never mind, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not succeed. You're in the water, so it would be disadvantage anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That makes me sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 25 points of lightning damage, which is not halved on you because the rage doesn't affect it. It only affects slashing, piercing, and bludgeoning. So you're blasted in the middle of the water. You sink for a moment as your muscles give out, your sword almost falls out of your grasp, and you manage to right yourself as you're treading water here. Your feet can't touch the bottom of this pool and your eyes go flashing white for a second, and for an instant, you see the face of Kord the Stormlord there from the vision your recently had. Then clarify and shake it out of your head and carry yourself back into place. That's going to finish this guy who's going to move around. He can only move ten feet so he goes five, ten. He's going to stop right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 16, which I believe misses, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Misses. Just misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as it claws toward you, you, being prepared for it, dart off to the side. It's going to go ahead and take a bite at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have such big hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, another natural 20 averted! However, that does come to a 19, so I believe that does hit you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoosh. Worcestershire sauce.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 11 points of piercing damage as it bites down onto the front of your clavicle and face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm unconscious. Again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First attack is going to be an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two because of the Haste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is with the plus two. I'm an AC of 15. I am easy target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, buddy. That does hit you. So the first harpoon strike against you-- that's eight plus four, 12 points of piercing damage. It jams you into the abdomen from that side. The other strike--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other person, I'm casting Curse of the Eyeless on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's finishing his round. He's attempting to bite you, that's going to be a 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he bites down towards you, this time as you pull the trident out you jam it up and it throws him off and clips him in the side of the chin, breaking off one of his teeth. At that moment, the guy behind you is going to swing in with his harpoon as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Curse of the Eyeless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, reaction to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I take my three points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. So he has a regular strike on this one, so the attack with the harpoon is going to be a 21 to hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he had advantage because he had you flanked, so it just made it a general roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses. So it bites down, you manage to duck out of the way and slam the hilt of your scimitar up into its face and knock it off to the side. That's going to end their go. That brings us to Beau. I need you to make a death saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were you saying the Curse of the Islands?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Eyeless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go cobalt blue. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my action to Invoke Duplicity, and I'm going to make her appear standing right next to Yasha. But I can't use my action to make her doing anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 30-foot range, right? So it'd be right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And then I'm going to use my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's gliding on the water, tiptoe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Healing Word at level two on Beau. I know that's lame, but it's something. Oh that's good, that's 11 points of healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) That's amaze-balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points to Beau. You come back to consciousness on the ground, your body was just starting to roll and slip into the water. You catch one of the rocks and keep yourself from going back into the drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try to still play dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all I can do and my action, and I'm not going to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your action was to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, that's correct. That finishes your go there. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Jester!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, how far can I get towards this one over there? Even if it means going in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? You can get partway into the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will I get within 30 feet of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, show me how far--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's here. That's (counting) 30, so most likely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to try it. I'm going to wade in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Just outside of 30 for the range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attack the one next to Beau. (coos) (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was considering it, it's just not what I wanted to do. I'm going to cast Dispel Magic on the storm above me.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at that, I believe the level is level three or lower? It's a 3rd-level spell. The storm immediately, with one final crackle, fades and dissipates above. The cavern above now just the empty, dark roof it was before, the storm no longer present.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody hears (nervous laughter).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 does not hit. You have three more attacks with your bonus action, if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage, all righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll swing again. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do it, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm literally just a windmill at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A whirling dervish of blades as you carve through. You start biting through with the blades, carves one part of its chest, part of its arm, down on its chest, looks up and right through its face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then spinning around, I go right to face the other one and I'm going to take my last attack against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. I don't even know why I'm bothering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, stick with the ones that were good for you. That one and the pink one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Molly's turn. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hand the books to little Kiri and I say: Keep these safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Wrapped around his weenie?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea. I'll take a little bit of fleece and rip it and cast Silent Image, and make a wall of stone around Kiri. Just say: Don't move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cannot see Kiri, just vanishes amongst the visuals of the illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to emerge?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot to do the 2d8 of booming damage on the gentleman behind Molly. So that's a big one, and three, so four points of booming damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, technically that was the other guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They shifted around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah. They do-si-doed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Can I appear right next to this gentleman on his reverse? There you go. I will break my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to-- fucking stay! If you want to, you can appear up top there and get a flanking bonus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds dandy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use it against them, they can use it against you, as long as you are directly across from an enemy with an ally, you can give yourself flanking benefit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. I will break my Hex, and I will use a Hexblade's Curse as my bonus action on that gentleman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On this one? Okay. There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will make two attacks with the Wastehunter falchion against him with the monstrous--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Flanking gets-- what does it add? Does it do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flanking? It's advantage on your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so first attack. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. And the second one. Neither of those are a crit, but that's a 24 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage for each.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 17 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? You fucked that guy up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll shift in right behind him and see Molly looking around, give him a little wink, and I'll take the falchion and take the back of his head off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, it's pulling back ready to leap at you, and as it lurches towards you it stops, you watch as the upper half of its shoulders and head slip and slough off into the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You fucking arsehole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'll-- oh wait. Natural 20. Peace out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You vanish out of the space. That's a hell of a round. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to go after this buddy here. Are we flanking him, technically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically, because Beau's on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is not threatening. You have to be on the opposite sides.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So disadvantage still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, because you're in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, that looked like a one for a moment. Sevens are scary. No, it was a seven. I was just staring at it going: oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did I get it, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah you did, you're right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much damage do you do? Because you hit it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heal 13 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 14 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hanging on by a thread.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, that hits. Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do it. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take my blade, slit it in its throat, pull its tongue through and give him a Xhorhasian necktie! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's that barbarian shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So one-handed wide swing, with the same motion, you reach up right into the wound, tear it through, and maintain eye contact as it tumbles over into the water and disappears beneath the surface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All day. I'm up for that all day. That's what I'm here for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That did not sound good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn? You still have your movement.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Beau, what are you at? Oh no, I can't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On my back, out of air, I go: That was awesome!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, could I walk over a little bit so I can stand on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stairs?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm not in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right next to Beau on the ground. You got out of the water. All right, ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a sound in the nearby water, as, emerging from one of the other caverns on the side, another merrow emerges from that side and another emerges from this side. The one up top here that sees everyone closing in is going to back up into the water, and is going to cast Call Lightning again. It wants to bring it about. Use the other level three spell slot. With that, as the cloud forms up in the sky again, seeing you step out of the water, you do not have disadvantage on the saving throw, but I need you to make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is good, because that would be 24 damage, so you take 12 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, 12 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got, like, 100 more points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm, as Matt would say, looking rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 20 to hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take-- that's a bad roll, eight points of piercing damage reduced to half, so you take four points of piercing damage. I need you to make a strength check, so roll a d20 and add your strength modifier as it's attempting to yank and pull you towards him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let him know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your thing, you are strong!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get out of the thing, go away. Okay, okay, okay. Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on your strength checks because you're raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I do! That's not much better. Ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulled a 13, natural nine plus four. You get yanked. Beau, you watch as Yasha gets yanked over you as you're lying on the ground, and it's going to attempt to bite you as you're down in the water once more. Natural 19. That's 25 to hit. So with that, the bite attack, let's roll damage on that. That is going to be ten points of piercing damage, reduced to five, 'cause you're raging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here is going to go ahead and move up right next to Caleb, rushing out of the water from underneath with the harpoon in its arms, and jam it towards your torso. That's going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You watch as it deflects off of your body. It's going to angrily attempt to bite down on you. That's a natural 17 plus six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will use the dodecahedron and roll a 20 on this side. I got a natural two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're rerolling for him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Alternatively, after an attack roll is made against me, I can expend the fragment to roll an additional d20 and choose. So two plus whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it attempts to bite down towards you, there's a brief moment where the bite sinks into your shoulder, and there's a brief burst where time seems to dart back, and you step out of the way as its bite hits air with no effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb will remember this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends their turn. Now it is Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, (slurred) Who's-- who's next? And I run over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's half your movement to get up, so you have 20 movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have 20 movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She healed up drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wouldn't she, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I able to, if I use Step of the Wind, am I able to make it around and get to this one who's harrassing Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Cause I'd have 20 more movement and then my speed, which is 40. So I should be able to make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So five, ten, 15, and then go ahead and make an athletics check to make the leap. I'm letting you see if you can make it across the water without losing your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're great at jumping over small bodies of liquid, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am. Yeah, that's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Yeah. (counting) You're just outside of it to be within melee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? I've got extended melee. Come on, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) Actually, 35, 40, you can do it with just one if you're there. So you manage to spin around, using your bonus action for Step of the Wind, so you still have your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Roll high on this one. That's good. 12 plus another six. That's 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate fish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hate-fish. They have great sushi there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to take the end of my bo, jab it right in its throat, see if I can get another one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's cocked. You've got to take the good with the bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses, however the critical did-- as you run up from the side, you parkour off the wall, the side of the pillar there, leap, whack! Slam it with the staff. You see its head get pushed underwater again. It turns around; its eyes are adjusting like yours were a moment ago, and as you go to swing a second time, it does manage to deflect it with the side of its trident. No impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's all I've got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes Beau's turn. Jester, you're up. Caleb, you're on deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of them looking rough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment? This one's been hurt, this one has not been, and this one is not visible. It is beneath the surface of the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have Jester run up to the one that Beau just hit-- yeah, the me. Yeah. And I'm going to Inflict Wounds on it at level one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So go ahead and roll a melee spell attack on it. If you want to move here, you can flank it. All righty. So you're opposite of Beau, using that flank maneuver. So don't forget, you guys can flank on direct opposites. They can also flank against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So what is it? What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know why I bother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At advantage, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, natural one and a natural four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a touch, though. Yeah, no, it doesn't matter. They're slippery little suckers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you swing out with your hand, your foot catches the edge of one of the pebbles, and you stumble for a second, and your hand goes wide off to the side, hits some of the stone on the wall behind you and releases the spell's impact against lifeless wall, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't touch attacks avoid AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's Pathfinder rules.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw. Man, that's old school.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus, I'm going to move my Spiritual Weapon and try to do the same thing and hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That it can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I flank it and get a bonus on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not technically a creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 2d8 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. Crack! The giant lollipop swings and hits the side of the jaw. It dislodges for a second, then for a moment it's trying to hold the trident with one hand and the other's trying to push it back into place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, tastes good, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to save my higher stuff for the guy who's disappeared, so I'm going to Fire Bolt it right at point-blank range at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were aiming six feet from it. It goes up like a firework and hits the roof.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to crouch down into the water and submerge up to my neck in the hopes that it does not know where I am and I'm too short to be hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like the gas range, he's trying to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's go. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're super fast. Remember, you're super fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 60 feet of movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help Yasha!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I suppose we're doing-- yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flank that Yasha enemy! (pigeon coos)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Running to the Yasha creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you running through the water or going to make a leap across?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Speed's doubled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) If you want to flank, you'll be in the water, which is disadvantage on your attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't matter, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage to disadvantage, straight roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a straight roll if you stay there, or a straight roll if you end up flanking it. Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, here's an interesting thing, is-- oh, god, yeah. I don't want to be in the water, so I'm going to stay on that little patch of land so I don't get--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So make your four attacks on it, if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, first two rounds. That's a 14 and a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, that'll do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the natural 20 is double the dice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, just roll the dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Eh. That's nine. And the other one is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage. And then your third strike with your Haste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third and fourth. That's-- one of them misses, but the other one's 19, the other one hits, the other one is ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that hits on the third strike, there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's better. 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh. 31 points of damage in one round. As you're carving through it rapidly, it is looking pretty hurt. It's not on death's door, but you singlehandedly carved it pretty hard in one round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already used your bonus action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind. That's literally everything I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Molly's go. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See, Kiri, I think they would have called if they really needed me. I think no news is good news, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just then, a couple bubbles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing. Okay, Fjord, you're up. As you reapparate within ten feet of where you were--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Closer to Molly. And I go, boo! Ah, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Party's left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is 18 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just remembering, why did you drop Hex again? It was because you cast--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So first strike was 18, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage, nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he still up? Then I'll send the second one in his direction as well. That's 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage, that'll do it. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll pop up and be like, fuck, the first time I do it, son of a bitch. And I'll go (magical buzzing and whooshing) and send both of them over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both (impacts) on its side. You watch as one of its arms gets blown off and flings, landing on the top of the stairs before rolling down a few steps and coming to rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As Molly looks over, I'm like (blows).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slips down into the water. Yasha, you take one swipe at it for good measure as it sinks below. All right, and roll your d20 to see whether you stay or go.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) Should I stay or should I go now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's important to remember that you don't-- (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So irritating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Can I get out of the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're in the water, so with full speed, you're probably not going to get to it unless you take an action to dash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll hop up back on that, out of the water there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have 30 feet of movement. There's the guy who's underwater over here somewhere, and there's the guy that's currently assaulted by most of your team on the other side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'll move closer to where I think the guy is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) There?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I will cast Healing Hands on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you reach down and touch the front of your chest--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bring me to a whole seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were that bad? Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two. Two hit points. That's two kittens, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, maybe not a good idea to walk over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Emerging from the water, the water splashes up as it glances up. On the other side, that one merrow's right there, have him surrounded, is going to make one strike again towards Caleb. That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That comes to 12 points of piercing damage. I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have a reaction? Can I hit it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, because it's attacking someone that's not you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Sentinel shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get out of here, status thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Terrible, terrible. That's a ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the damage before, DM?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. My web browser's going insane. I can't. Hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Refresh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got you. I got it right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no internet right now. I rolled a six, and I don't know what my con is because I have lost--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in your notebook somewhere. Your character sheet. You printed it out somewhere, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't have a print-out of your character sheet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe your constitution is 14, if I recall? Which brings a +2 to what you rolled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you got that right, that's some fucking Beautiful Mind shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 14. Failure. Haste wears off, because you lose concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, does that mean I-- oh, shit. I'm out for a round, aren't I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does the exhaustion happen when the spell's broken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When the spell ends, the target can't move or take actions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a shitty side effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, to follow that up, it's going to bite down towards Caleb, seeing that you're probably the easiest meat around here, unarmored. That's a natural 20. I'm having really good luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm easy meat!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Check the lollipop, it's so inviting!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tasty treat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so with a bite attack against you, that is 14 points of piercing damage to you, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sounds like some horrible curse. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, it's okay, because there's fucking smoke on our map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pleased.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Taliesin. A great gift I'm glad I've been able to use finally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay, so half damage. We'll see what it rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, 13 or less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not even joking. You can look at the dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't fucking believe that.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: She's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, you're at one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know that, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's me already? Oh, shit. I'm going to unleash on this guy. Again, crack, crack, see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on these because you're flanked currently with Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, goodness gracious! Yes! I'm going to try and use my staff to pole vault me up in the air and go crack, crack, with two big swoopy swoops. I'll take the 13, eight plus six is 13. 14!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits him. Armor class of 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's eight plus another four so that's 12 damage for the first one. Second one. That hits, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits, roll damage for the second strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whack, whack! You hit both sides with the staff. It's being knocked around, spitting blood out of its mouth. It's hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mildly hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hurt pretty bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one more ki point. I can stun it, or I can do Flurry of Blows and try to kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill it! Flurry of Blows it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, last ki point. Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make two more strikes against it.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (chanting) Apology, apology!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guilt attack!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Did I say I was sorry?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey Caleb, we should talk later. I'll take that 13, so it's 20 for the first attack. And then 12? No. Yes. No, 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, but one of them does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stupid. Seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage, how do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pole vault up, do the two hits, and then I want to parkour off of the spiritual weapon a little bit, Marty McFly on the lollipop, and then do a flying roundhouse to his face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crack! It slowly slides, gurgling, into the water, sinking below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stand up, throw my hair out of my face, and that ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Cure Wounds. I'm going to walk up behind Caleb and give him a hug around the waist and say: you're okay, my friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's like this in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast at level two, so that's 2d8 plus four. 12 points of healing for you. For my bonus action, I'm going to have my duplicity self run up and stand right next to the spot where the fish wizard comes out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. She's going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look real mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Finishing your turn, Jester, Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to wade onto the land, just behind Beau there? Yeah, if I go in that direction, can I get off on dry land?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just barely get onto land if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that, and as I'm doing that, I'm pulling out my little clay cat's paw and I'm going to hold Maximilian's Earthen Grasp. As soon as I hear fish talking in the water, I'm going to let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step out of the water, by the way, for my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you step back. That ends your turn, Caleb, as you're holding your action. Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to (retching), and throw up for a second, because I got vertigo because I lost Haste. And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take one more swig, and I'll jump in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your movement, you get most of the way across on the rope, but you can bonus action to dash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action dash!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Nott just barely emerges from the distant pool of water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are they?! Let me at them! I'll save you all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any monsters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get this water off me! Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott's splashing behind you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shake like a dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll reappear and take--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabouts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten feet closer to Yasha's direction, on land still. I will hold Eldritch Blast until I see the reappearance of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Roll your dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To hit for it? Oh. Aww, shitballs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16. Ah ha-- (yelps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Held actions and Blink can be a really tricky thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Show your fucking fa-- (yelps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you move while you're not blinked, by the way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you see into our world?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can see and hear and all that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like an ethereal-- like Frodo with the ring on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guys? (distressed yelp)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is what Ripley used on you guys last campaign.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck you, Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Fjord's turn. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god, okay. I'm going to hold-- I'm going to stay where I'm at. I've got nothing to attack so I'm just going to hold my turn until I, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold your action in case something shows up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, in case something shows up in the water and then I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us the merrow shallow priest's turn. As you're all focusing on this element, a small ripple of water emerges over here as it has swum down below the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cat's Paw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cat's Paw. What does it have to roll for it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16. Strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 strength?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it get a saving throw, you mean? A strength saving throw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "On a failed save, the target must make a strength saving throw." Versus my 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is an eight. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (meowing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is currently restrained, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it takes 2d6 damage. Bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really big cat paw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's gargantuan. All right, how much damage was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six total damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So a big muddy claw sinks into its tail and pulls it down in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point it's holding its staff still and (hissing), spins its arm around. A level two Thunderwave bursts out in front of it in a 15-foot cube, hitting both Beau and Caleb. I need you both to make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The damage doesn't do anything to its spellcasting ability, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So what do I take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a success, so you take half damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to make this. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take half of that, so you take eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, just Caleb. She's still up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cat's Paw's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cat's Paw's gone. Caleb's unconscious. Easy come, easy go. Beau, you are thrown ten feet back into the wall there as the smoke dissipates from the Thunderwave. Wham! Into the wall and fall to one knee. Let's see. No, that's all of its movement. It took all of its movement to get there, so that's where it stands. That's going to end its turn. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turn this man into fish sticks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunts) I'm a little out of-- it knocked the wind out of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it has to make a constitution saving throw to see if it maintains the thunderstorm above. Which it succeeds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to run up towards it, once again parkour off of that little-- yeah, and give a nice flying Superman punch and then an uppercut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First hit. All right, I'll take that 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're technically in the water, so the attacks are at disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 still hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's ten damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten damage. Got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second attack. 16 for the first one. 16 again total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits again. Second attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a success, and a success, so it's still maintaining concentration on the lightning storm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And bonus attack. Not good. Nine to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It swings wide. It's laughing under its hissing breath as you're punching, and it's starting to try and slowly submerge into the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (panting) I'm losing steam. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run to the other side of Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm flanking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here, you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I wouldn't be able to hit it from the land, would I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's where you are, but you're in the water right now. You're (splashing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I would get a straight attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to try to hit it with a level three Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You have disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, a straight because it's flanked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're flanking it, so it's a straight attack, yes. You pull back (energy crackling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's fine, it's fine, it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These dice are wrong and bad dice and they should be put away forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out with this crackling bolt of looming necrotic energy, it manages to spin around and a burst of wind immediately pushes your arm just off course and it releases harmlessly in the air. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At least you got an apology when you rolled shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, cool. I'm going to use Spiritual Weapon at level two and then try to slam it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll for the attack on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a level three Spiritual Weapon. It's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast it at level two earlier though. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I cast Spiritual Weapon at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was level two at the beginning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I didn't. I cast it at level three. I did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all went, "Whoa! Level three!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, there was a "whoa" there. We will all get yelled at on the internet if we're wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it's three. It was level three. It doesn't matter. I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I trust you guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But for next time, when you kill it and get a How Do You Want To Do This with it. Just in case.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you want to sweet tooth this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, I need you to make a death saving throw, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Let's do this. That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Molly, you have a turn now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, laugh. Laugh it up. I'm pregnant! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to make a leap across some of water at the very least to try and get back to land?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A woman scorned by her dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I only see that at home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You go (splashing) (counting) 30.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to also then use my action to dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 20. You get up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm within range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Combat range, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only use your bonus action to attack if you've used your action to attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. Wait. Double check, because I thought that's just using my off-hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm thinking, but I'll double check what the rules are there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay, I've got options. Sort of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every now and then you need a reminder, folks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Laura go to deliver the baby right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When you take the Attack action and attack with a light melee weapon that you're holding in "one hand, you can use a bonus action--" If you don't attack, you cannot bonus action attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That's fine. I'm going to try something weird, hold on. Since that's not going to work, can I take Enthrall? I'm going to take Enthrall. I'm going to try and use Enthrall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it an action or a bonus action to use? Because you've used your action this turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's true. I'm trying to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe Enthrall as a spell is an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be it. Yeah, it's an action, never mind. Vicious Mockery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vicious Mockery, I believe, is also an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, everything is an action. I have no bonus actions or anything reasonable that I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're in melee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm in melee. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Molly. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeing my friend Caleb down, I'm filled with a mighty rage and I will draw my crossbow, load my Burning Bolt, and run at it screaming and firing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) It's within 20 feet. As you're running out of the water, (screaming) (splashing).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 20 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage with the additional Burning Bolt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (counting) Fury of the Small, 21, plus the Burning Bolt is another three. 24 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to make a constitution saving throw to see if it maintains. No, it does not. It drops the lightning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That alone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That will keep Caleb alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Next attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, shot. 22 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just one now. Another eight points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shallow priest is looking hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shallow priest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a merrow shallow priest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very shallow. Really hot Instagram account, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that finish your turn, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. And I'll unleash two Eldritch Blasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Beach priest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not going to hit. That's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes wide, strikes a nearby rock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's a 14 on the dot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it does, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one has higher armor than the rest. As you release both bolts, it's flailing around, hurt after taking the impact from the bolts. You can see the burst of flame on its back from the shot it took from Nott, and as it lurches forward, it manages to arc out of the way of your bolt. No impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, roll to see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll to see if you stick around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I disappear. (bamfing noise)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god! You're cutting out, Fjord, I can't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys are doing good-- (bamfing noise).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take ten feet to the right. I can't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lag spikes are rough when you're on a raid, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like those Tatasciore spells. Like (mimics cutting out).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go around to-- Can I flank him? Behind or somewheres?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Front of Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now? No, the space right there where technically it is-- I'll say you can get up on there, sure. Using all your movement, you can get on there. It's a little wobbly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then, you know, attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Hold on, Beau was in the water. This technically is not a space you can get on. You would not be able to flank with it. You can get there if you want to. Because this is in the space.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not considered flanking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you have to be on the exact opposite. That space is currently occupied by the stalagmite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's fine. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the water, so disadvantage on your attacks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Disadvantage. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't even realize I was sitting here like---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like this little dark cloud right over you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill it, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, buddy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Roll damage for your second strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage. It is so close. It is hurt so bad. As you slash twice, in the water, you see these large arcs of stale, stagnant cave water splashing in the air with this gleaming blade as Yasha's tearing into it. The pool around it is turning dark purple as its blood is seeping in and it's looking desperately around for some means of escape. That end your turn, Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I don't think I can't do anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now the shallow priest's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Thunderwave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, you're all grouped together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's what it's going to do. Level two Thunderwave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would Caleb have flown backwards when he was struck before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When Caleb was knocked down by Thunderwave the first time, would he have been thrown backwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nowhere more for you to push this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I thought--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Is he within the cube?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it depends where the cube goes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a direction. It's not a cube around you, it's a-- you have to shoot it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Considers consequences. Plans his retribution.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Decides to kill Liam forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he wants to escape, he's got to knock us all back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As his hair dangles beautifully in front of his face. Thinks-- (singing) I'm in another dimension!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doing the Charleston.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go ahead and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's only three squares, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's trying to-- Yeah, you guys are positioned in such a way where it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says in any direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well yeah, but you can't be part of a cube, and I'm trying to figure out what would be the most optimal way for it to use it. I'm going to say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's my money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the ones who are hurt the most are Beau and Yasha and they've been the biggest problem for these guys. It's not too worried about the other two. 15-foot cube. Okay. All right, you know what? It's going to go ahead and attempt to shift this way one square, into the space with the Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it gets an attack of opportunity from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And from Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And from Jester. Both of you guys, make an attack. With disadvantage for you, Yasha. It's risky on its endeavor, but it's what's going to give it an opportunity to try and get out of this lockdown.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a 16 and a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 16 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's just a regular attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, regular attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So if you hit with your Sentinel does that mean its speed is reduced to zero?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. It can't move. So with Sentinel, it does not get a chance to move as you arc towards it. How much damage did you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. How do you two want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go low, you go high?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I go low with the handaxe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you swing with the handaxe and you swing with the sword as it backs away, charging the energy of the Thunderwave in its hands, it tries to slink through the water, the blade of your handaxe carves into its throat from this side (painful grunt). At which point the blade hits from this side (slurp). And like a terrible scene out of Riki-Oh, because I have not used that reference in this campaign, the body gets split in two sides and you watch as it falls to the ground in three separate pieces, (thuds) all sinking beneath the water below.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: See ya!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldn't want to be ya!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god. Can we grab some of the stuff before he goes into the water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're looting him before he--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, before he sinks down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should I make another death save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do, Caleb. That's cocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go-- Are we still in initiative order?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, at this point, there is no threat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I Blink back in and go, stop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You drop the spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Cure Wounds Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and heal up for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last slab of its flesh that you had carved from its head and shoulder area you push into the water, kicking it forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. 12 points of healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Caleb, you heal 12 hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. (groans) Ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not attractive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way over and up the steps?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll join you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because there is time to take a break. We'll be back here in just a little bit, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good shit, man. Good shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, there's condensation on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it's really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody! Carefully clapping, so not to clap too much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you got to just do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi everyone. Welcome back. Before we jump into the story, real fast, we wanted to say a quick hello from a friend of ours who stopped by the office and tonight's studio to say hello. Babs Tarr, the very, extremely talented comic book artist for many different comic series. Incredibly talented and is very much a Critter along with us and stopped in to say hi!

lines.name: BABS
lines.text: Thanks for having me, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course, thanks for coming by! Where can they find you?

lines.name: BABS
lines.text: Oh, babsbabsbabs.com or @babsdraws on Instagram and Twitter. Check it out, guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check out her book, Motor Crush!

lines.name: BABS
lines.text: Thank you! Yes, Motor Crush Volume 2 just came out, so check it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And your nails are amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Babs.

lines.name: BABS
lines.text: Bye, guys!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She did that and I was like, ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So blue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Picking up where we left off. You guys rush to pull Caleb off the ground. You're all beaten, battered--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm standing right there, so I'll get you up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my Pearl of Power to regain a 3rd-level spell and then I'm going to use Prayer of Healing on everyone. So everyone I can see within my range. So everybody get within 30 feet of me! I'll do 3d8 of healing for everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously? (shouting) Seriously!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think of the baby! Stay calm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one, a one, and a two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shrieks through gritted teeth) So eight points of healing, you guys, for that level three spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, but that's still--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't even need it because I wasn't hurt at all in the fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take your eight points?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points of healing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of healing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (muffled shrieking)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The baby can hear all of this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This game's going to make me go into labor!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if it does, you guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we need her for as long as we can keep her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That'd be so magical.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not really mad. I'm fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for dilation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway. Your wounds close up a bit through the incantation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The smallest amount.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look pretty bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look pretty shitty, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your shave is still very nice, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that stuff up there? I'm going to start hobbling towards the bottom of the stony steps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, do you-- yeah, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check for traps, you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay! I can do that. Are there any boxes or treasure chests?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see remnants of crates and broken goods littered across the rough staircase, now that you take a moment to inspect it. Make an investigation check if you want to glance about the space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With disadvantage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, because you are drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find some broken pieces of pottery, it seems like. Nice, polished on one side, with a nice glaze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can write down in your inventory "broken pieces of shiny pottery." Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pick up his big trident that has the cord attached to it? Is it wrapped around his wrist, or anything? Is that how he was pulling people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you look at the trident, it looks like it's a very tightly woven rope, but the individual threads of rope are treated like a leather-type stat, so it's a really tight leather cord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it attached to his person in some way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, where it was dangling from there, they're wrapped in a loose loop around the side of their armor, and when they throw it, they catch the end of it and pull it back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the trident and unhook it from his armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heavy, so it's about twice the weight of hemp rope. It's stronger, but it's heavier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These guys were big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're pretty strong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take a short rest while everyone's doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys want to take a short rest, if you guys are inspecting the rest of the area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, y'all look for shit. I'm going to meditate for a hot second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're going to meditate, maybe go back and check on the little bird?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did you leave her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think she's okay, I left her in an invisible-- I made a false rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go into the water to look for her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, as you come back into the next chamber, you're looking around and there's no sign of Kiri. You see natural stone, the pool, a piece of wall to the side, and there's no sign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! She's been taken! Kiri! Kiri!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "I'm Kiri!" You look around and you don't see anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri? Where are you? Are you invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Yes, I'm very sweet!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Kiri! I'm going to find you. Say "warmer" or "colder," and I start walking around the room. Warmer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Warmer?" You slowly start making your way towards this weird cylindrical stone wall that you now realize wasn't there before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a weird-looking wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach through and your hand goes right into a tuft of feathers. (startled chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri reaches up and grabs your hand, and you pull her through the illusion. She steps out and goes, (like Cali) "I killed people!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good for you! I did too, just barely. It was a bad day for me, Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri points to one of the bodies of the merrow that you had killed the night before that's barely visible out of the water there. It looks like it has a couple stab wounds to it, and Kiri's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you go stab a dead person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably teach you that's not the coolest thing to do, I don't think, but it's fine that you did it this time. I'm sure he didn't feel it. But probably if we're in a place where other people are around, we probably shouldn't stab people that are already hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Okay, okay, okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, no, that's a lie. Unless they are attacking you. Don't stab people that are dead-dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Okay, okay, okay."
