lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I realize something in a panic and I trudge through the water back towards the entrance and I pull out the wire and I put it in my hands and I cast Message and say to Jester: Please, please, please get my books and put them in your bag, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Watch me roll a fucking 20 on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god no. That was cocked, and I just moved it. Oh good, that's worse. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you spend a moment searching around in the middle of the dirt with no luck, there's a little knock on your shoulder with a pointed finger. You glance over and Kiri has the book bundle, the leather strap--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were you holding those the whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) Points to the side corner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put those books in this pink bag, okay? All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any stairways, or doors, or gates, or anything that would lead upwards from this cavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to start inspecting the area: up the stairs, there's a platform above where there's more of the boxes and crates and there's piles of things gathered around some sort of rock formation, where that mist seems to be emanating from, which is still loosely drifting off of the surface of the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take a closer look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 19, for 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one that looks like a dark, horned crown that you recognize that is used to invoke Asmodeus, the Lord of the Hells. You see one that looks like-- you only see a few of these, but it looks like a series of chains and shackles that are across a coffin-like box, and you know that, because you rolled super high, to represent Bane, the Strife Emperor, who is a deity of conquest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's hear it, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Bane voice) "Your punishment will be more severe."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were waiting for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As well as the clawed hand on a number of items that resemble Tiamat, the Scaled Tyrant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys, come up here. There's a ton of arms up here. There's battleaxes and swords, but there's all these trinkets and holy symbols.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you being careful up there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Careful?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know. Nott could have a look around, I could have a look around once Jester returns with my books.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I actually wouldn't mind if you check for magic. And Nott, actually, there's this four-foot long box if you want to try and open her up for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you return. Did you take Kiri with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll have her hold on to my belt as we swim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it locked?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so. It looks to be latched shut in some way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you hear a distant sound that echoes through the wall (fluttering). You spin and look over and you can see Jester emerging from the water and a little black bird that is currently fluttering to try to get the water off the feathers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start speed wading back. (stuttering) Are my books dry?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I put them in my coat. Don't worry, they're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But can I see them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they dry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're dry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're dry. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what were you looking at?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a locked box?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The four-foot long one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's two boxes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two boxes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The iron one and the wooden one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I recommend that you allow me to check for magical problems. Then once we know what's what, then you go in. But that takes about ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yes. Sounds good to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure. We're kind of in the middle of a short rest anyways.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I will pull out my spellbook and I will use ritual casting to cast Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you focus, there is a-- as you look over, there is a faint magical aura from inside the pool where the mist is emanating, and the long wooden box emanates a magical source from the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the staff that the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to try and retrieve the body. It sunk into the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We grabbed it before it sank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staffed one? Okay. As you pull the staff over, the staff does not have any magical properties. It looked like it was just a focus for whatever spellcasting it was doing. Make an investigation check as you were going back to the body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a glow in the water as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not doing anything. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not the pool itself, but within. And the mist is still pouring over the edges of it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The pool that's up at the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the upper platform.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like having codenames.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you looking? Who's looking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try-- Should I try to open the box?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's still doing his magic circle or whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We know that there is something magical in the pool itself and then you said the long wooden box is glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of magic is coming off of the wooden box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enchantment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Enchantment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (exaggerated cockney accent) Enchantment!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exaggerated cockney accent) Enchantment! Hi, Yuri.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a look in there. I'll walk towards the pool at the very least. I'm going to pick up any of the Moonweaver pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check as you pore through and find as many as you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't believe that there is any kind of protection or magical lock on that. So, yeah, try to pick the lock from a distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, what are all these things, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not entirely sure, but they're very, very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you glancing through as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I want to find something for the Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this on the priest? The shallow priest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the pile of religious iconography.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Okay. Because--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You find-- and there's a number of these. You see, probably, in total, well over 100 to 120 various holy symbols, idols, small representations pressed into metal or clay. These are all means of worship from a grand scale to a pauper scale that seem to have been part of what was moving through this smuggling path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking for the Traveler's symbol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, who have never met anybody else who has ever met the Traveler, you look down and find amongst this pile two holy symbols of different make. One appears to be almost pure silver. One looks like it's a little more of a burnished bronze or a dull iron that's very, very heavily tarnished. But they both have the same door arch with the road expanding from the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Look!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it? What are they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I wasn't talking to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are you talking to, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Traveler! Lookit! You have symbols here!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like a door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a door. He's a traveler. He travels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His symbol is a door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feel the Traveler in here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if he is, he was fucking with me earlier. Are you in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see anything from Ioun? I hobble up, crack my rib back in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's actually a little discomforting, these symbols.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would say so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You give a solid glance through and it looks like, no. Ioun, the Knowing Mistress, is one of the approved religions, and you get the sense that all the symbols that are here are religions that are unapproved by the Empire or considered betrayer gods and are not approved anywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I find for the Moonweaver?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, plenty of Moonweaver symbols. There's probably a good 12 or 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Asmodeus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which ones are the bad ones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Asmodeus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asmodeus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Asmodeus, Bane the Strife Emperor, Tiamat--

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: (singing) Asmodeus, Asmodeus!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Mage Hand from afar and try to unlock the big box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your-- with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, an 18 and a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, look at that! Even while drunk, little Nott's able to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sing-song) Do-de-do-de-do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sing-song) Whoopie-doopie-doopie-doopie-doop, click!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did check for traps, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't matter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm opening it! Fuck off, grandpa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit back and watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's doing it from 30 feet away. Hopefully that's enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The latch spins off, and a blade fires out from where the lock was, shoots across the room, and vanishes into the darkness before it scrapes off some stone in the distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Nott!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With what little bit of light that you guys have at your disposal now, you can see it shining and it's this pure gold color. As you swing it for a moment, it seems to bend with the movement before flicking back into place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's made of rubber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the rubber pencil trick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a super long blade? Or is it like a rapier-type thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would constitute in the vein of a scimitar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That looks very exciting. I'm going to run over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't think--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, nope, no-- I'm pushing aside. I'm going to try the weight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty well-balanced. Lighter than you'd expect. And gold is not a good metal for any sort of combat. It's a soft metal and you see the flexibility seems such but yet it'd probably hit pretty hard, but you're a little worried about using gold for any sort of combat scenario.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's ceremonial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Swing it around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give it a swing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Swings pretty solid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Want to hit me with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, wait! Let Caleb look at it. What if it's super-duper cursed, Yasha?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll melt it down and sell it for raw gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's worth more as it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have we found everything? Also, while all that was going on, I was looking for a jagged cross with two crescent moons in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and you managed to find it. You find probably about 6 or 7 different variations to the Archeart's iconography.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Archeart?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of those 6 or 7 that I saw, I will take the one that looks the most familiar to me from my memory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find one that's pretty similar to the one that you saw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pocket it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 13 to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To look for a symbol of the Stormlord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find about four of them. Two of them are medallions and one of them looks like a ceramic marker that would be hung on a wall. One of them looks like it was part of a latch on a small chest and was torn from it. You see bits of rotted wood on the back of it where it may have been previously pressed in and bolted against the outside of a chest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look around on the walls and on the doors and, using my criminal background, see if I see anything that's Thieves' Cant or smuggling operation things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. While you guys are having this conversation, Beau is casing the joint here. There are no hidden exits. In fact, you get the sense that all the entrances and exits here are through the various pools of water. You begin to think, based on placement, that there's probably a network of caverns here, and possibly more merrow that exist in the vicinity of the lake, of the Ounterloch beyond here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you describe what the Bane, the Strife Emperor, symbol looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually. I can show you an image of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, there are a lot of shackles around everywhere, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In general.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't we find, like, four manacles? And there were four dead bodies, too, right in the other room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We keep finding dead skeletons.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And also steal 185 gold, which we did not disburse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is what you see. It's like an upside-down, coffin-like design, with these chains that cross over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just this little handheld thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It's roughly a little larger than your palm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I toss it into the well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It sinks down and for a moment, it obscures, but you see this very faint yellowish color on the bottom. It disappears into the pool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you do that? Are you trying to bring about this really weird god? Can I reach in and try to get it out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. You reach in and you scour around and your hand touches and finds the symbol. Next to it, there's a polished stone about that big that's resting in the silt at the bottom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. I reach in and grab that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull out the stone, and as soon as the water emerges from it, it's smooth. It looks like a cat's eye. It has a yellowish color to it and there are striations that refract light around it. At one end, it looks like there was-- an impact carved a line about three inches across on one side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clearly that's what's glowing at the bottom to my eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a very faint yellowish glow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind of magic, school of magic, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a school of arcane magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is this? I still grab the other little symbol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, symbol there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. I think you should put it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Want to look at it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's put it down with that sword that we found, Mollymauk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the groove in it look like it matches the size of the blade of the sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sets it down, and rests it there next to the other symbol, at an angle. It doesn't look like it matches the sword. The groove that's hewn into it, what at first looked like it was impacted or wounded by some sort of damage, upon closer look, it looks intentionally placed or carved in. So you have this cat's eye, yellowish sphere with this three inch-wide, pointed oval line in the front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Looks like it's an eyeball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could be the end of a sending stone or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did any of the shortswords, longswords, battleaxes-- any of those register under Caleb's magic sweep or they're just nicely made?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just well-made, like freshly made and were being sent somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we take them all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to see something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold it up in front of my face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, you're a cyclops! Kill her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come with me, okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to lead Jester up to the top where fish guy was at the beginning with his staff. Set it down, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you guys are standing right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're already up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you've removed from the pool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I want to go up where all the little thingies are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's set it down, just in case. Okay? Then I pull out my spell book again and-- Will you hold this for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I will. Thank you very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sit down with me. I rifle through the pages to the right one for Identify and the sword is down. Okay, I'm going to use this one. You can see-- and I start showing the different glyphs and I start the ritual.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord. Something about that orb is very familiar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's teaching you magic. Listen carefully.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll learn new spells this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm listening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did he just say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not talking right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's muttering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it takes ten minutes to make the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, while you're doing that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there one more box we haven't opened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one more metal box that's not been opened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I open it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should check for traps and open it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll finger it from afar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we far enough away from it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, because you are drunk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Seems fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll open it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, we've moved it aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Disadvantage, to try and open the lock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this, thieves' tools?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thieves' tools. So it's dexterity plus your proficiency bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll never figure this out. Dexterity plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Proficiency.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the inside, you see a beautifully smithed sword handle and hilt made from silver with an acorn-sized emerald set on each side of the hilt, right in the center.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, let's put that in the pile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no blade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade extends for an inch before it's broken off at a jagged angle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put that in the pile, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An inch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's an inch of the blade. It seems to have broken off at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it magic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought it was just the long box that we already opened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, this was a metal box.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You did not sense any magic from this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Can I use Mending on it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If the box was solid enough, that's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You attempt to cast Mending on this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, it resists it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, put that shit in the pile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's something about it. Even though it didn't emanate a magical essence from what he was requesting, the Mending spell, for some reason, is unable to grasp the nature of this object to complete it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would think there would be enough time overlap, though, for Detect Magic to still have one or two minutes left before we get to the end of Identify. So if that is brought over, do I notice any sort of glow from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No magical essence from it, but as you're looking over it, beyond just the beautiful make of it, you do see runes carved across the hilt and at the pommel. It looks like at one point it was an enchanted blade, but was sundered and is missing the rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So I mutter. I pause my chanting and say: I will take a look at that in a moment. Hold on. And finish my 11 minutes of ritual casting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not going to interrupt, but that sphere looks very--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like an eyeball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, famili-- Do you mind if I-- is it wet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. Is anyone going to interrupt me before I get to the end of Identify?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Let's wait in real time. 11 minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't look like the gash in the orb is deeper than the length of the blade that's left, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. What was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a bunch of sexual innuendo, Matt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But what about the other sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was your question?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The-- god damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. He said before that it didn't look like the blade made the gash in the eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But this was a different blade.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a different blade, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are two blades.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. There's a complete blade that's magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm just wondering if it fits. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, fits the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let him finish the damn spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it fits the gash in the side of the sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sphere. The broken hilt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The carve in the sphere is about three inches long. The blade looks like it would've been about two inches wide and it's broken off at a jagged side angle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is furrowing his brow at everybody arguing about this as he's 30 seconds away from ending.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop! Con-cen-trate! Con-cen-trate!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lost. Gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll help Jester look around. Maybe we see a broken blade somewhere while he finishes that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester's holding my spell book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I pass it over to Nott. Here. I'm not learning anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester and I do a quick scan to see if we can find the broken blade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Investigation check. Either both of you roll, or one of you roll with advantage. Up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you see anything? Take advantage? A nine and a ten? It's okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Looking around, you see no sign of any other half of the blade, broken or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was in a case, so I suppose it would be unlikely. Or if it was on its way somewhere, it was probably on the way to the other end of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk back over to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anybody else? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you find out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you finish casting Identify on--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On sword and cat's eye. It's whatever's sitting in my little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The sword is not magical, and so it does not give you any essence as to what enchantment it is. Looking at the runes, you could see that there was once held magic--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The complete sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the finished one? Sorry, I misunderstood. That, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All this shit doesn't exist, so sometimes it's hard to tell what we're talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It exists, Liam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That, you do have immediate grasp of what it is capable of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This blade is called Summer's Dance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Ooh, I want to dance with somebody.

lines.name: MARISHA, SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) I want to feel the heat with somebody!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mr. Mollymauk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a kind of magic that I do not even possess that allows you to vanish from one point and reappear in another, and this blade will allow you to do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (maniacal laughter) You're going to get yours, oh yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a very fine blade. It is more lethal than a regular blade and will allow you to poof, poof, poof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be living the dream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can all argue over it, but I hand it to Mollymauk. As well as the cat's eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you begin concentrating another ten minutes on the cat's eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it one spell, one item?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You choose one object to cast on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So wait another ten minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While he's concentrating on it, can I sit down next to him and touch it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Touch it, meaning his penis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're welcome, internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Caleb's concentrating on it, you reach out and touch the stone. Your body immediately goes cold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! He's dead, he died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could have waited 11 minutes, but no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reward." Just as quickly as the vision came, in the blink of an eye, it's gone, your reflection now that of the familiar half-orc, looking into the pool where the stone was found, but the stone is gone. The rest of you guys watched, in the middle of this concentration, while Fjord touched the stone, grabbed it, and jammed it into his chest. Before all of you could even react and push forward, it had already been thrust through his armor and into his body. You reach over and try and grab him, and with a strength you've never felt in his body, he lurches towards the pond and thrusts it fully in, seemingly under some sort of uncontrolled force, his eyes glazed over and staring forward. Suddenly, he comes back, and as you glance around, you feel tension on your body as all your friends are grabbing onto your body and pull you away from the pool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck was that?! What just happened?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exhausted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you clammy, a little warm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually take a point of exhaustion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I touch his chest and his stomach?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, check to see if there's a scar or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no damage to the armor, and as you pull back some of the leather plates, there's no sign of a wound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel funny. What happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, did you Identify it before it went into him? What was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Into me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have the thing in you!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's now in your chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You grabbed the stone before I had a chance to finish what I was doing. Why did you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I felt like I'd seen it before. I just wanted to touch it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. You ever see something you felt like you'd seen in a dream before, but you don't know why or how?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry. I felt compelled to-- I felt like there was half a chance I'd touch it and it wouldn't be there. I saw things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People I knew. A man, he's very dear to me. I don't understand it, but he was-- I was him, and he was holding the sphere. The eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was him, what does that mean?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who was he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Again, you ever have that dream where you look in the water and you see another face looking back at you, like you're someone else?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 50/50. You said I put the sphere in my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you stuck it into your chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw him do-- I saw me as him doing the same thing. He was standing over someone, covered in blood, and he put the sphere inside of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was my mentor, a captain of mine. A man named Vandrin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've heard you say his name before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I haven't seen him in quite some time. I don't know what any of this means, but I'm not a fan of losing track of time like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what if you're cursed now? How do we know you're going to be okay? You have a weird thing inside of you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do you feel any heartburn or any constipation? Because that thing was big, and it's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bend over and put my hands on my knees, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't feel any strange spheres in the inside of your abdomen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't feel anything. I do feel pretty tired, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened to Vandrin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not exactly sure. He may be dead. He captained a ship that I worked on for many years and there was an incident.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the ship sink?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe so. There was an explosion, and we were in terrible weather. There were waves, we were being thrown about, and I was knocked overboard. I never saw what happened to Vandrin, but when I woke up, I was back on shore and I didn't see anything of the ship or him or any of the other crewmates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he's alive and you were seeing through his eyes right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like that. I would like that very much; he was very good to me when a lot of people in my life haven't been, but he was holding the sphere-- how could he be holding it if I was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe there's more than one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe if you concentrate on his idea, maybe you can feel him some way. Or maybe this thing is like a beacon to him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe he's cursed and he's going to turn evil and kill us all in our sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you're cursed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you skipping any details?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, how did you survive? [battle music]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I feel like something's going to attack us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll for initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (demonic voice) I'll tell you how I survived!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't spoil the surprise, Travis!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a trauma film, no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you skipping any details?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I recognize the body that was lying in blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Nobody you'd seen before. All you recall is seeing the orb and the same sword that you have in his hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was almost like a father to me, and I never saw him holding anything like this. Not that I remember. Do I ever remember seeing anything like that in his quarters, in his offices, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, weirdly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's unique, I'd remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a strange aspect as you focus really hard to remember, but the face that you saw in the water was definitely Vandrin. Maybe a little younger than you remember him: faintly less gray to his hair and facial hair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not leaving anything out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But how did you survive that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not entirely sure. I remember getting thrown overboard, the waves overtaking me. It was a hell of a fight, and I'm a real good swimmer, but you'd come up for air one second and your mouth would be full of salt water the next. I remember losing track of which way was up. It's funny, when you're underwater and it's dark, the only way to tell which way is towards the surface is by blowing bubbles. I did that as hard as I could with all the air that was in my lungs and those bubbles disappeared. I remember it stinging, filling my chest and the next thing I knew, I was face-down on the shore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds a lot like dying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I've heard a lot of tales of men drowning, being brought back. They say that same thing. But no one was with me on that shore, I was alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe mermaids rescued you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe your father is a sperm whale and that's how you survived, because you're half whale or fish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you're a mermaid and you don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that that's likely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What kind of ship was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a merchant ship. He had many.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the explosion you talked about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a bit of sabotage on the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A coup?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wish I knew. If I'm lucky, one of these days I'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, might be sooner rather than later, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, that's totally weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up and take a look at this pool one more time. I want to taste the water; is it fresh or salt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The water is salt water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The pool water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pool water is salt water. All the rest of the water in this cavern is fresh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The pool water is salt water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's sea water.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fjord, what if you try jumping in this water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of agree with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why were they bringing religious iconography to this thing? What were they trying to do with it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this is all, from what I can recognize, deities that are not sanctioned by the empire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But good and evil deities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, things that are wanted that are illegal are going to be wanted. It seems like there was clearly a high demand for some people to worship who they want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the edge or around it, right? Not in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and you get-- make an intelligence check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we're missing something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at this, and looking at the way things are spread about, you get the sense that something drew the merrow to the safe house. They took whatever they found in the safe house below, tore through it, and placed whatever was important to them in this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They wanted this eye thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the whole reason they attacked was-- what if they attack you now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: For having the thing inside of you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you can't see it! I don't have it!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Maybe they can sense it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We solved it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We solved the mystery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Dancing Lights and scour the room. Is there anything we're missing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How big is the well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly five to eight feet in diameter.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happens if you look over, do you see yourself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, that's not a bad call. I'll check my reflection in the well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look in the well, the water is moving in there. It's you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to push his head underneath the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (splashing water, sputtering) Salt water, you start coughing for a minute and come up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughs once)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's coughing up salt water again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just like his dreams.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tap three times when you're done. Push him under.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you breathe? Can you breathe underwater?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (inhales)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are drowning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm tapping like a motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull him out of the pool. He starts coughing up the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're even for the teleport now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he's a mermaid anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course, it's possible it hasn't actually had an effect on you yet, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it can only be on the full moon, or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't make any sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know mythology.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, can you Detect Magic on Fjord? Can you sense anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you have 11 minutes to spare, yes I can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just point out, not to be a jerk--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this about whales?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I begin ritual casting Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing that, you do get the sense that the longer you're here, in a nexus between these numerous merrow tunnels, the higher your chance gets of having more arriving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, ritual casting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, let's get out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This place is definitely making me nervous. We should do our best to cut off this particular flow-through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe they were gathering a bunch of these items because they were looking for the exact one for this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were trying to please it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we gather up all of the things and put them back up in the tree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we put them all in the bag?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody want any of the weapons? Shortswords, longswords, battleaxes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's leave it exactly where they're supposed to be so we did our job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean, "where they're supposed to be?" They stole it from the smugglers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're working for the smugglers. We'll put it back in the safe house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll take it all back upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys gather up as much as you can, take your way via the rope through the water, Kiri in tow. You make your way back up, handing things off up into the tunnel. Eventually, over the next hour or so, get most of what was down there that you could back up into the safe house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of the weapons that we found better than my handaxe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, they're all what they are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any dope bos?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're Beau. You're looking for a staff?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bo staff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No quarterstaffs. They all appear to be steel weapons that are part of this cache. There is a long polearm-- a halberd, there's two of them-- that does have a shaft of wood, but it's designed for the weight of the bladed edge. You could break it off and make it a quarterstaff if you really wanted to, but it would be comparable to what you already have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I have a staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any shortswords better than my shortsword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're well-made and fresh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like mine. Do they seem sharper, or deadlier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're less worn, but they're not deadlier, per se.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's holding onto the broken-off hilt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it in the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind if I carry that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I take 30 seconds to see if it jogs my memory since I'm such a history buff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I assist him on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have assistance. Roll with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope. Big 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't jog your memory. It looks old. Looks like it's been around a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and do it myself and do a ki point thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you already aided somebody with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wants to do this. See if it does anything. That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't try to stick this inside of you too, though, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're back up on the upper level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are back in the safe house now, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we blow up the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's possible, I would love to cave this thing in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have boom sticks still?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't, but two of us do. Wait, do I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have four sticks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Won't the sound attract all of the things? I feel like the sound will attract all of the merrow people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as we're not here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they're going to come up once we're out of here. They'd have to dig through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have two of them among us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mind like a steel trap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do not have any.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just said we have two sticks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I heard that, but who's got them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's got the sticks? We've got sticks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also have a propeller beanie, and a bag of chips, and-- I heard you say that. Who has them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's Molly and Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have any.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a tinderbox.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't have any.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amongst you, you have two of those. Whoever has them, you're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're pretty sure we have them, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Light the damn sticks of dynamite! Just do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, wait, but-- Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to check out those bodies that were downstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the human skeletons that were down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were probably smugglers that were keeping the safe house for the Gentleman.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did check them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They had manacles on them, though, didn't they? That means they were slaves or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or taken prisoner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's lots you can do with manacles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blowing up a cave, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Climbing the rope back up top, to the base of the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather your things. (lighting dynamite) Watch it sparking. It disappears, you begin to leave. As you guys are all walking out of the storehouse, from behind you, off to the left, there's a dull sound, and some dirt and water from the left side of the tree in the middle of the hot afternoon (muffled impact). The still water that currently exists around begins to slowly drain as a part of the swamp off to the side sinks down about ten feet or so. The water level drops a solid foot, but it comes to rest. You're sure that whatever structure that remained down there before is now filled with dirt, sludge, swamp water, and rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope we brought Kiri with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri is with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Why would they do that?!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I take down the bodies that are on the trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is anybody helping you with that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Leave them to rest in peace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester and Yasha start taking down the bloated bodies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we doing this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that people know that we took care of it. So it's not a danger anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And to rifle through their pockets, I imagine.

lines.name: MATT, SAM, LAURA
lines.text: We already did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're the worst people ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing with the bodies? Are you leaving them in the swamp to fester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we put them in the water or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, food. It's the circle of life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singing) Circle of-- You take them and pull them off-site, and leave them in a pile to become one with the swamp over time. It's pretty gross work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want swamp things? This is how you get swamp things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While they bury bodies, I pull Caleb aside, and say: hey, can I talk to you for five seconds? Ten, maybe, tops. 15. Okay, it might be more like 20 seconds. Will you give me 20 seconds? Over here? No, you know what, it's fine. I can say it in front of everybody. I'm sorry. I wanted to apologize for last night. I got a little aggressive, a little handsy. I shouldn't have done that, I was out of line, and I shouldn't have brought up your past shit. Sorry. See, 20 seconds, that was about right? That was good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) Genuine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm-- He's just staring at me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb! Here's where you respond to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You saw the worst side of me--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give Beauregard a hug, and say: I don't know what I'm doing. Just go with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Fjord over my shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look to Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hug him back? Do I go like this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not too tight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pat, pat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This makes me feel awkward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (applause)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was really good, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "Welcome to the Mighty Nein!" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (awkward laughing) That's not necessary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes it is, she was really rude to you and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not. Necessary. Working on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it? I don't know how I feel about that. Good talk, friend. Seriously though, friend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ja? How do you say it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (coughing) Quit while you're ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. And I walk away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Been a while.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Caleb, do you know how to find our way out of this swamp?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Find our way out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, aren't we done here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're done, we're heading out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we have (cocks crossbow) a troll to find.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drunk-ass fucking Nott, dwelling on old shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You made Babs Tarr hide her head in her laptop, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could just leave.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, that is 100 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he almost killed us like super easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He bleeds death and stuff. We'd have to hit him from afar. It might not be worth it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, my friends, whatever we do, we are really fucked up. At least Beauregard and I are really fucked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blam blam!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you just Salt Bae them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is now my new favorite--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great! You both heal 12 points!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my goodness! I'm almost up to full now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think Salt Bae cleric is my new favorite idea for a character.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was that for everyone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was just for them. I'm sorry, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a great roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shit, let's go find Vecna!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys gather your things and begin to trudge southward, back into the Labenda Swamp to make your way back to the city of Barleben, a bit wounded, but you've succeeded in your first task for the Gentleman, you begin to make your way through the reverse guidance of Caleb in the direction you were traveling. Backward guidance, we'll put it that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reverse math. We came from that direction precisely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, where was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the hilt of the blade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a Final Fantasy VII Materia rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Materia slot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His sword keeps getting cooler and cooler.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like it's the basis of his class.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bling it out, man. Bling that shit out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a wonderful week, we'll see you guys next Thursday, we love you, and is it Thursday yet? [music]
